net.big_oh.common.web
Class WebUtil

java.lang.Object
  net.big_oh.common.web.WebUtil

public class WebUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of static helper methods that facilitate inspection and manipulation of objects from the javax.servlet.* library.

Constructor Summary

Method Summary

Constructor Detail

WebUtil

public WebUtil()
Method Detail

approximateSessionSizeInBytes

public static long approximateSessionSizeInBytes(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
Calculate an approximation of the memory consumed by all objects stored in the HttpSession. The estimate will often be greater than the actual value because of "double counting" objects that appear in the object graphs of multiple session attributes.

Parameters:
session - An HttpSession object from any web application.
Returns:
An approximation of the memory consumed by objects stored in the HttpSession object.

getSessionAttributeNameToApproxSizeInBytesMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getSessionAttributeNameToApproxSizeInBytesMap(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
Calculate an approximation of the memory consumed by the objects stored under each attribute of a user's HttpSession. The estimate will often be greater than the actual value because of "double counting" objects that appear multiple times in the attribute value's object graph.

Parameters:
session - An HttpSession object from any web application.
Returns:
An approximation of the memory consumed for each attribute name in the session.

countAttributesInSession

public static int countAttributesInSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
A convenience method that counts number of attributes stored in a user's HttpSession.

Parameters:
session - An HttpSession object from any web application.
Returns:
A count of the number of attributes stored in an HttpSession.

getNamesForSessionAttribute

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getNamesForSessionAttribute(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                          java.lang.Object sessionAttribute)
A convenience method that performs a reverse lookup to find all names under which an attribute is stored in a user's HttpSession.

Parameters:
session - An HttpSession object from any web application.
sessionAttribute - Attribute name of interest.
Returns:
A seet of all attribute names under which the sessionAttribute parameter is stored in the session.
